website_summaries.verdict: Durable sneakers whose fanbase has grown in the past two decades, the Etnies Kingpin has become a favorite among skaters and non-skaters alike because of its excellent durability, cushioning, flexibility, grip, and boardfeel. Affordability is also a factor why these $50 low-top kicks are among the bestselling models coming from the Etnies portfolio. If you are looking for a low-top skate-ready sneaker with a minimalist treatment that would last for months and years, the Kingpin might be a better choice.
pros: Several reviewers like the thick padding material on the tongue, collar, and the foam footbed that assures a snug fit and cozy interior
Quite a lot of loyal Etnies fans say that the shoe feels great and comfortable for daily wear
Numerous buyers of the low-top skate shoe are pleased that the design and feel of the footwear have not changed through the years
A good number of skaters find them durable that the sneakers wear out first in the sole but not so much in the upper
Some users appreciate the double stitching that assures of quality and durability of the low-top shoe
A considerable number of skate shoe critics have high praises for the high-impact rebound of the STI or Sole Technology Institute Foam technology
Some professional skaters noted the sneaker helped a lot in “preventing heel bruises.”
Many skateboarders are impressed with the technology used by Etnies that improved cushioning and impact protection compared to skate shoes from other brands
Many serious skaters find this enduring footwear silhouette “highly capable of withstanding a heavy beating“ with the stitched 400 NBS rubber cup outsole
The 400 NBS outsole has a steady grip with its tread patterns that has excellent grip, traction, and board feel
A few customers buy these sneakers as their work shoes as they can last for years without wearing out
A few users say the design has remarkable arch and ankle support
cons: Some skaters with wide feet complained that the tightness of the Etnies Kingpin caused a bit of discomfort around the upper toe
A few users complained that the shoe needed more durability on the high-wear areas
One commenter said that the stitching was removed while the glued on sole were detached from the upper after a few extreme jumps

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Two months after buying these there are holes in the centre of both heels, its almost as if the structure has collapsed. My son rarely moves at anything faster than moderate walking pace. The uppers are fine but I can only describe the heels as awful. Pity as he says they are comfortable. I very rarely give bad reviews but this time I must.
customer_reviews.author: hijlj;hj

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe that's similar to the old Vans!
customer_reviews.text: Decent and comfortable shoes. They're similar to the old Vans in shape and size, although they do come up a little smaller than usual. So if you're on the border of your size definitely go up by a half or full size. They're a kind of matt suede and are great if you don't want bling "look at me shoes" They've held up nicely in the few months they've been used, including being caught in a shower a few times. I'll update if they start wearing prematurely. Overall comfortable and nice looking shoe. Great for anyone who misses the old Vans!
customer_reviews.author: Earthiel

customer_reviews.title: Good value classic skate shoe
customer_reviews.text: Having previously worn a few different brands of skate shoes, and other Etnies styles I wasn't really sure what to expect from Kingpin's. The muted black on black colourway works well, the sole is comfortably cushioned, and the tongue and ankle well padded. Unlike Faders or Lo-cuts, these seem to have less height in the toe box, and have a seam running the full width across it, so until you break these in it is worth wearing good socks, but once you do these are comfortable, keep your feet securely in place, and muted enough to wear in the office without obviously looking like you're wearing trainers (result!)
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo the Great

customer_reviews.title: Shoes arrived as described and comfy but also covered in ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived as described and comfy but also covered in something that has stained them green, the paper they were wrapped in yellow and my fingers yellow after touching them...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit as they are a minimum half a size too small, you have been warned
customer_reviews.text: Well i bought another entries online and ordered a UK size 11 and they were a UK size 11. These entries are, on the package and shoe, a UK size 11 but are definitely a UK size 10. Unreal but not entirely unexpected. Order a size bigger and they will too big but a half size bigger then they should fit. Personally i am sending back and they can shove them.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Cliff Lickley

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Why oh why is it so hard to get shoes like this these days. Vans? DC? what happened? Love them! Great for the wide footed fellow. Warm, comfortable and looks good! (especially with the bright green laces I bought!) And for £30? Bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Buys too much!

customer_reviews.title: Check the fit
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these shoes for years. They look good, wear well (wear and tear) Stitched all the way around, so the sole doesn't separate as it does with some other shoes. Very comfortable, even you get the right size. Despite no change to my foot size (I'm on my 40's) I've had to go up a size from UK 12 to UK 13. I've checked older shoes and they seem to be smaller than in the past. How hard it is to make the correct size?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with fat laces
customer_reviews.text: The last pair lasted 6 years, and I hope this pair will last as long. My wife wears them with 20mm super fat laces and loves how they remind her of the old style skate trainers she used to wear. The first pair ran a bit small so I ordered a size up which I probably shouldn't have as they tend to rub, I should have ordered the 5 or 6 in hindsight.
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs C Mullis

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, comfortable and cool looking, but quality?
customer_reviews.text: So I like Etnies I like this kind of shoes htey have a good feel on my legs, they look really cool. I can run in them, jumb, be casual everything with one pair. But the quality I am not sure, so I had them for only 3 months and the side got ripped already, yarns broke inside. Maybe its just my faulty pair but dont know, would be nice of amazon and etnies to give me feedback on this I really like them but 3 months and they already ripped thats really sad. Hope others didnt have my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Luka

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes by far, you won't be unimpressed.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, only ones I buy now. Comfy, look good and they last for ages. My old pair are used for work now so still going strong. The new pair I purchased were a fraction of the price of the old ones, so very impressed and once the new ones are tatty I will be getting another pair 👍. 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟
customer_reviews.author: Collin Gallie

customer_reviews.title: Treat your Feet 👍
customer_reviews.text: It is always a chore finding comfy trainers for my feet, a size 10 but one is slightly wider then the other, i took the plunge and ordered these. Fit is perfect, nice and snug but not tight. A very comfortable trainer and has not even broken in yet 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Phill

customer_reviews.title: 'Go To' shoes for an everyday option.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a skate shoe with maximum performance,genuine durability, and offering something substantively different from the rest of the market then the Etnies Kingpins are the great.On my 3rd consecutive ve pair,last circa 12 months, with no real wear! My 'go to' shoes for an everyday option.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Allinson

customer_reviews.title: The tongue is enormous
customer_reviews.text: The tongue was so utterly enormous i could barely get the shoe on. Once on the look is comical. This is not clear in the description or photos. I had to unstitch the shoe, 'thin the tongue' with scissors, then stitch it back up. Quite a big job and not entirely worth it; though the tongue is less comical, the padding around the ankle is still pretty fast, so it's an odd look.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's quite a bulky shoe, and the padding especially for the soles of your feet is very lacking, for a skate shoe I was expecting more, maybe too much for the price of it. I will buy some gel insoles to pad them out a bit
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but not the best comfort
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Globe trainers but saw these and thought “how different could they be?” turns out, quite a bit. I love the look of them but you can tell the quality isn’t as good. I can feel the stitching inside rubbing against my toes and the bit where the eyelets for the laces are started giving me a rash the first few times Inwore them. They look great but I wish that Inhad bought a different pair whenever I put them on. Which is a shame.
customer_reviews.author: George Hill

customer_reviews.title: Kingpin's FTW!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of these shoes, first pair lasted 3 years and for everyday wear that's pretty good in my book. So glad i could find the same model again =D If this is your first pair of skater style shoes please remember the soles always take a couple of weeks to wear in and become flexible with the shape of your feet, once that has happened they're like slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Khal

customer_reviews.title: Real nice
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoe. Sturdy construction, good ankle support, snug and very comfortable. I used to buy merrells as walking shoes, but these Etnies are more comfortable, of equal or of better quality and at a lower price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Nicholas  K

customer_reviews.title: If you wear skinny jeans (up to you) you will look like a golf club with these on your feet
customer_reviews.text: A bit puffy on the tongue but otherwise a well constructed shoe that should last. It's the stitching around the sole where it attaches to the uppers that sold theses to me, none of that glued on gubbins that peels away after looking at a puddle. If you wear skinny jeans (up to you) you will look like a golf club with these on your feet. Glad I got them whilst they were on offer as it just made them a better bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Marengo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. My feet thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these as a replacement to my Vans, which over the last 3 years had gone through hours and hours of abuse as my work shoes. So I decided a change was needed, I received these on the next day delivery, and to my feet's pleasure had an instant soothing comfortable feeling like walking on clouds. My work is now eternally better and my colleagues no longer have to put up with me moaning about any discomfort, there is a spring in my step. I'm thinking about getting another pair just incase these go obsolete. Overall a great investment, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ian James

customer_reviews.title: 'You get what you pay for'
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very uncomfortable, they are not finished off properly inside where the tongue is stitched to the upper. (under the laces). They look okay on my shoe rack. I have been intending to try and cut off the surplus material that is causing the problem but I have other priorities, and other shoes. These could be a one off problem from the manufacturer, only the supplier would know.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey S.

customer_reviews.title: As good as ever
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I'll do if Etnies ever stop making the Kingpin. This is my third pair in a row, they're the only shoes I can find that are a wide-enough fit. They're hard-wearing, long-lasting; their plain black understated styling goes with everything I wear, because much like my shoes I just buy the same plain black hoodie and blue jeans again and again; nightclubs that don't allow trainers still let me in wearing them. They're basically the perfect shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Aston

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet brigade, look no further
customer_reviews.text: I always struggle to find trainers that fit my wide feet (unless I buy a couple of sizes up, these are comfortable, and generally last me a good year at a time unlike cheaper skate shoes that fall apart within a month or two
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, I was going for black airwalks, but these caught my eye, reasonable price and comfortable to wear, may be buying these every time I ruin my skate shoes on my grip
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Look great and fit great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. I now have one happy other half. They look great and are apparently very comfortable. After a 12 hour shift he comes home and pops them on, as they are that comfy.
customer_reviews.author: elisha

customer_reviews.title: Has to be said as comfortable as vans old skate line
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a decent comfortable skate shoe for years now since vans started going with the snikers style almost given up but these are the best thing since i wasn't expecting much for my money but got more than bargained for great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Incoming75

customer_reviews.title: A real skateboarding style shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I what I was looking for, I prefer this style of trainer as it has much more room width than the thinner fashion skate shoes that they all seem to be doing now. This was to replace a pair VANS that looked nearly identical, so far I prefer these for comfort I hope they last as long.
customer_reviews.author: Andre M. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but small
customer_reviews.text: They get a 3 star vote from me for the fact that they are sleek, comfy and, if my last pair are anything to go by, almost indestructible for about 5 years. However, the marvelousness is stunted by the very miniature sizing. I'm not sure what happened but the 6's now feel a lot more like a small 5 and attempt to relocate my big toe to be somewhere near my arches.
customer_reviews.author: GG24

customer_reviews.title: Still look good after a year's use, and no significant wear showing.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Vans skateboard shoes, but they stopped making their high quality hard wearing shoes, so I had to look elsewhere. These are quite similar. I don't skateboard, but wearing these every day for work for almost a year and also for cycling, and they still look quite new. Just ordered another pair as they were on offer.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Need some preparation before wearing.
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe rubs up against the back your ankle and, since it's very good quality and quite sturdy, will cause you to bleed if you don't let them sit for a few days with an industrial grade clothes pin in that area. This lengthens the hole just enough, so it no longer injures you.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Mateus

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these trainers. They are a little bulkier than most trainers available in recent times. These are more like the skate shoes I used to wear in the early 2000s. I find them very comfy and they fit perfectly and I bought my usual size. They seem good value and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes - I've had 3 pairs over the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes - I've had 3 pairs over the years. All have lasted at least 12 months with daily wear. I've had similar shoes from other (cheaper) brands, which haven't lasted half the time. Very comfortable & I love that the plastic strip at the bottom is black, it means they stay looking clean & un-scuffed for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great hardwearing shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my skateboarding son who is quite hard on shoes. He's still wearing them! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emer Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these for a couple of months now, and they fit brilliantly, i use them almost every day and they show no sign of degradation yet, they're also suprisingly waterproof, sometimes with this material i expect soggy socks in wet weather but not with these, very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jord

customer_reviews.title: Same great design on the outside
customer_reviews.text: Same great design on the outside, but what ever they have lined them with, my God does it make a beyond smelly feet smell..I have other trainers worn for ages and odourless, these were worn for an hour and they stunk to high heavens. Both pairs went right back for a refund.Sad, the suede version from a couple of years back I still have no complaints or odour.
customer_reviews.author: Aliswoods

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This will be the third pair of Etnies I have bought They are really comfortable trainers Great to walk in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great colour
customer_reviews.text: This is a birthday present for my son who only wears this type of shoe. I loved the colour and hope when he opens them on his birthday he will also.
customer_reviews.author: worsecookever

customer_reviews.title: Very thick. Hot feet!
customer_reviews.text: These appear very well made, but then they should be for the price. They are very thick with lots of padding and my feet felt very hot in them. Because of the extra thickness size 11 was a bit too tight. I returned to the seller for a full refund with no problems. I bought some excellent No Fear trainers with a similar design from Sports Direct instead. These were much cheaper and have lasted a year with daily wear!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Thomas Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Very nice skate shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these. They are a little tighter-fitting than expected, so I had to work with the lacing just a little, but no problem once sorted. They look great and feel as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Mindpower

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have regularly bought these over the past 10 years. Very reliable comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time
customer_reviews.text: As if it isn't bad enough that these weren't delivered anywhere close to on time, the size up replacement that I received and a completely different in-sole that was basically like cardboard compared to the original size 11, my usual size, but too small. The insole on the size 11 however was far superior in quality. You are basically guessing when ordering these shoes, stay WELL AWAY and go to the high street to try them on.
customer_reviews.author: Tonaki

customer_reviews.title: These shoes look fantastic, top half is brilliant quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look fantastic, top half is brilliant quality, first day of wearing them today, I'm only 4 hours in and the souls of my feet are in agony, I can already feel the criss cross part under the insoul of the shoe, there digging into my feet, and really hurt
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair as perfect as the first
customer_reviews.text: I have had these trainers before and they are so comfy and fit my wide feet really well. I hate buying new shoes as I have to break them in but these were perfect from the start. Well done to manufacturer and supplier
customer_reviews.author: patricia taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Probably the last and best skating shoes that actually last more than two months.
customer_reviews.author: christopher hadwin

customer_reviews.title: Robust well made shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits right and very tough. They're sometimes a bit smelly though, bot something I tend to suffer from in other shoes
customer_reviews.author: N Aberdeen

customer_reviews.title: Great for very wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Love these, my husband has very wide chunky feet and these fit great so always buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Little lady

customer_reviews.title: I now prefer these to Vans.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Etnies after a spate of Vans. These are comparable in comfort and build quality to Vans but I have to say the styling of these shoes are more to my liking along with a more reasonable price. I think I will be sticking with Etnies foreseeable unless Vans have a styling re-think.
customer_reviews.author: 1337n00b

customer_reviews.title: UK sizes  take a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but upon reading some reviews before I bought a lot said to take a half size bigger i'm usually a 9 but I bought a 9 and a half and i'm glad I did they fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable trainers
customer_reviews.text: Used to wear this style quite a lot when I was younger. Recently I found that the trainers I've been buying have rubbed the backs of my heels making them bleed, so I thought I'd switch back to this style. Very well padded around the top so that sorted out the issue with rubbing. For me these are quite a snug fit and didn't take very long to stretch in.
customer_reviews.author: Steveo

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and quality shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of these shoes; comfortable, particularly for people with a wider foot and a simple aesthetic. They hold up much better over time compared to other brands; I stopped buying Vans years ago, and just use Etnies now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently wearing my third pair of these!! I absolutely love them! I’ve always been a huge fan of Etnies and when I was told I was allowed to start wearing trainers to work these were the ones I wanted! They’re very comfortable and do hurt at all, even after a 10-12 hour shift on my feet!! Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Davey

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers use for skydiving. Comfortable and clean up well
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 pairs of the same shoes from this seller over the past 2 years and have never been disappointed with the speed of service or quality of product. The only reason I have bought so many pairs is because I tend to go on muddy walks with my dog! The shoes themselves are all still comfortable and have not worn out. Highly recommend these comfortabel shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Flowerpot

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome, this is the second pair I have purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome, this is the second pair I have purchased after having a previous pair for several years. I had purchased some Airwalk Neptune shoes in-between and these were rubbish in comparison (Half the Price but half the quality and comfort). The Kingpin build quality comfort is excellent. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dom_Edwards1

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my son. Super quick delivery, packaging was perfect. The trainer itself was great quality & what we have come to expect from the brand - well made & comfortable. Happy son is a happy mum.
customer_reviews.author: Trish K Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe and my son very pleased. The tongues are a bit thick he says. !!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Spencer

customer_reviews.title: A little tight on arrival compared to my previous pair ...
customer_reviews.text: A little tight on arrival compared to my previous pair of Etnies, might just need breaking in but after 2 weeks walking around Asia in these, I still struggled to put them on each morning without using a shoe horn
customer_reviews.author: Skellyhell

customer_reviews.title: Nice kicks
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy and snug to wear and walk in. Seem easy to clean and are pretty stylish, going with most of my trousers. My mate even decided he wanted a pair himself.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: These are woman’s trainers NOT men’s as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Totally fed up ordered these as gift for son after his Christmas items for new home didn’t turn up !!!! Although these show on sight as men’s in fact they are woman’s so second gift also useless will be returning ASAP and suggest Smazon gets its act together and starts vetting both suppliers and own web sight for accuracy as both eight and box show woman’s and men 😡😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Cross and fed up !!!!

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love it, holds up realy nice and it's confortable
customer_reviews.author: Tobak Denes

customer_reviews.title: Great skateboarding shoe,A+.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking skateboard shoe, well made. Fits as expected, really comfortable. Very happy with my purchase. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve brought a few pairs over the years, absolutely love them, fit perfect every time, soooo comfortable. Considering how much I wear them, good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Schult

customer_reviews.title: Just okay trainers..
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear a size 12 but had to return for a size 11, these trainers are made on the larger side. I have wide feet and find them comfortable now I've gone down a size though it would of been nice if the soles held their cushioning a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Jays Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, i don't really skate to be honest, i got these ready for the winter to replace my wrecked vans slip ons, overall great quality and feel warm just a bit roomy, a lot of space, size 13 usually is the sweet spot for my foot but with these it was a bit too big, but still great trainers
customer_reviews.author: theinfidel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great teainers, bf loves them, says they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Aft H

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing the old Osiris nyc86 for years and really disappointed with Osiris new quality so thought I'd give these a go. Very impressed. Hard wearing, really comfortable, perfect size and has kept colour like new for a lot longer then expected.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Cowey

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: fantastic shoes, wide fit great quality i love ETNIES! and at an unreal price!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus C.

customer_reviews.title: Ok...
customer_reviews.text: I already owned Etnies Lo Cut 2. I ordered same size but I think that this one is a little bit smaller than Lo Cut ones. And I did not expect this huge tong... My first idea was return them, but I tried them on at home this weekend and now I love them. Jesus, I look like my girlfriend. Just four stars because the size.
customer_reviews.author: Carbonero

customer_reviews.title: Slightly tight
customer_reviews.text: Slightly tight but i can see it giving...i have Gorilla feet..jus the way it went...😂
customer_reviews.author: M.OSMAN

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy , but the rubber round the edge of the shoe started to come apart after a month and the shoe split after two , not very well made, although the stitching prevents further parting of the rubber, they don't compare to previous globe shoes, they lasted for years never came apart and eventually disintergrated through wear and tear
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cj Preston

customer_reviews.title: Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully all good, Xmas pressie so don’t know yet but they look nice
customer_reviews.author: Lynn P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Loving them exactly what I needed comfort as too. I got a half size down going by reviews I read and they fit perfectly already got a second pair ordered 👌
customer_reviews.author: Daniel young

customer_reviews.title: Good buy !
customer_reviews.text: My son is a size 9 and thats what i ordered and they fit perfect . They are nice to walk in and look really nice .
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: nice shoe comfort is good .Made well and a good price .All in all im happy and would buy another pair .
customer_reviews.author: Pastychops

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice skate shoes super comfy still wearing a year later!
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, skater look - son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Thank the heavens I have finally found a school shoe that my son wears that can withstand him scootering and playing football in!! No more Clark's for me - these bad boys are built to last and I will no mirror what others here do and buy only these for as long as they make them.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Made to last...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality Good value for money Fast delivery Only make If trainers my husband says lasts the longest !!!
customer_reviews.author: rebekah knapton

customer_reviews.title: Like all Etnies they feel tight or small for your ...
customer_reviews.text: Like all Etnies they feel tight or small for your size but after a few hours of wear they decompress a lot and feel like normal, my opinion only but I've used this brand for years and they have always been the same for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes - good fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered UK 8.5, and got what I ordered (also shows US 9.5) - well made shoe which fitted well (I'm usually either an 8 or 9 so went with 8.5 as a best guess). Very happy - I'd order another pair but I fancied a different colour... :o) Shoes came from Germany, package tracking worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love theses trainers, they are my work shoes and I am on my feet for 8-9hrs a day, amazingly comfortable, added a waterproof spray to make them stain and water resistant. Over all pretty epic :) no worries
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: What to get instead now?
customer_reviews.text: They used to be the best. I'm not sure what's changed but they don't last anything like they used to. I've been wearing etnies for 15 years but recent pairs are not made of the same tough stuff they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Jarman

customer_reviews.title: Little bit large
customer_reviews.text: I have tried these on and found that they are a tiny bit larger than the ones they are replacing. They are replacing the same Etnies with the same size gleaned from the label. I am sure that when I have worn them in that they will be fine. An excellent product. My original Etnies I have had for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have searched a long time for a brown skate shoe to replace a well loved Animal pair l once had, these Kingpin's fit the bill perfectly... So much so l will definitely be looking to buy further pairs from Etnies .............
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm A

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these if you have wide feet
customer_reviews.text: After Vans stopped manufacturing comfortable walking trainers, I was forced to look at other brands. A couple of shops recommended these Etnies to me, so I bought them after following Amazon’s size recommendation. These shoes are simply not designed for those with wide feet, as they really squeeze on the sides toward the front. Returned them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but don't last for a skater.
customer_reviews.text: Love etnies but really wish they'd make them more durable. My boy skates in them once and they're destroyed. Pretty bad considering they're a skaters shoe. Come on etnies, sort it out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Millin

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Have had these shoes before and was looking to buy a new pair as old pair have worn down. Was unsure on size as have small feet but size was spot on and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, seem to be of good quality
customer_reviews.text: At £40 you expect to get a good quality pair of shoes and this product delivers on that. Comfy and good wiggle room for my size 13 feet is a rare thing and these achieve that so with no complaints I kinda have to give a 5-star rating really
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as they have a thick sole. Really pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: shoeaddict

customer_reviews.title: Rub on ankles
customer_reviews.text: Rub on ankles when wearing for long period of time
customer_reviews.author: R Lund

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for wide feet. Haven't been as durable as a pair I bought on the high street a few years ago, hence the three stars... Definitely should also have longer shoe laces.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: It's for my son and using it for school. He said that it's the most comfortable shoes he had for school.
customer_reviews.author: marius swart

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these ones for years. Get some they’re ace
customer_reviews.author: simoon

customer_reviews.title: Proper skate shoes!
customer_reviews.text: 3rd time I've bought these shoes. They last me about a year each time and I wear them everyday for everything. They're great for skating too as they're pretty much bomb proof. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're nice shoes, very comfy
customer_reviews.text: It's my 5th or 6th pair of Kingpins. They're nice shoes, very comfy, however the soles and insoles aren't the greatest. They last for around a year or a year and a half of moderately intense usage. I keep buying them, tho.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru Sasu

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look smart
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable straight away. The third time I put them on I ended up doing a 4 mile walk on hot pavements. No blisters!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Gee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable work trainers
customer_reviews.text: Over all, they are comfortable and smart and for the price a good buy. I found one small dislike. That is the tongue is to thick due to a lot of padding and makes it awkward to tie up the laces - though the padding would be great if you are working around a hazardous area.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barns

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with these shoes, incredibly comfortable and look great on. They look smart and after a short time of wearing them, they still look like new. The fit is perfect and after purchasing other brands in the past and being a little disappointed, I will definitely buy this make again!
customer_reviews.author: Surf Chick

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As usual with these , just ultimately comfortable , love them and they look brilliant
customer_reviews.author: shaun hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! You can't go wrong with these Etnies hence I have bought loads of them for my hubby and son. Really good skate shoes and very comfy, from what they say. Good quality shoes, as you would expect
customer_reviews.author: smm

customer_reviews.title: Best option
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. You've got to spend a bit more, but they last longer than the cheaper airwalks. And for my size well happy on the price. First pair I've had in years, as I usually live in my chainsaw boots, well happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These trainers were really nice however the tongue was very fat/ thick and the ...
customer_reviews.text: These trainers were really nice however the tongue was very fat/ thick and the shoe was a bit narrow fit.
customer_reviews.author: shane

product_meta.title: Etnies Men's Kingpin Skateboarding Shoes
product_meta.description: The Kingpin is a classic Etnies style that has a Foam Lite 1 insole, a midsole of egg crate construction and the outsole is 300NBS rubber. It has a perforated styled 'E' on quarter panel and padded tongue and collar.
